Financial Reports for Ads 
bookmark_border
On this page
Ads revenue
Monthly global ad revenue summary
Monthly country ad revenue summary
Monthly day ad revenue summary
Weekly global ad revenue summary
Weekly country ad revenue summary
Weekly day ad revenue summary
Aggregate ad revenue per video

These are the financial reports available for advertising-supported videos.

Ads revenue

The ads revenue report contains revenue and view data related to advertising-supported videos.

Monthly global ad revenue summary

This report summarizes monthly, worldwide ad revenue for all content types. Each row in the report includes monthly ad revenue totals for the content. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_global_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type

Additional fields:
owned_views
youtube_revenue_split_auction
youtube_revenue_split_reserved
youtube_revenue_split_partner_sold_youtube_served
youtube_revenue_split_partner_sold_partner_served
youtube_revenue_split
partner_revenue_auction
partner_revenue_reserved
partner_revenue_partner_sold_youtube_served
partner_revenue_partner_sold_partner_served
partner_revenue

Monthly country ad revenue summary

This report summarizes monthly ad revenue for videos on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular day in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_country_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
country

Additional fields:
content_type
owned_views
policy
youtube_revenue_split_auction
youtube_revenue_split_reserved
youtube_revenue_split_partner_sold_youtube_served
youtube_revenue_split_partner_sold_partner_served
youtube_revenue_split
partner_revenue_auction
partner_revenue_reserved
partner_revenue_partner_sold_youtube_served
partner_revenue_partner_sold_partner_served
partner_revenue

Monthly day ad revenue summary

This report summarizes daily ad revenue for videos on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular day in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_day_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Weekly global ad revenue summary

This report summarizes weekly, worldwide ad revenue for videos. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular week. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc. A weekly report begins on Monday and ends on Sunday.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_global_ad_revenue_summary_weekly_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type

Additional fields:
owned_views

Weekly country ad revenue summary

This report summarizes weekly ad revenue for videos on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular week in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc. A weekly report begins on Monday and ends on Sunday.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_country_ad_revenue_summary_weekly_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
country

Additional fields:
content_type
policy
owned_views

Weekly day ad revenue summary

This report summarizes weekly ad revenue for videos on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular week in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc. A weekly report begins on Monday and ends on Sunday.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_day_ad_revenue_summary_weekly_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
day

Additional fields:
content_type
policy
owned_views

Aggregate ad revenue per video

This report summarizes monthly, worldwide ad revenue for videos. Each row in the report includes monthly ad revenue totals for the video. The report may contain multiple rows per video if there are revenue adjustments for the video related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Weekly video ad revenue summary

This report summarizes weekly ad revenue for videos on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular week in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc. A weekly report begins on Monday and ends on Sunday.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_ad_revenue_summary_weekly_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
video_id
channel_id

Additional fields:
video_title
video_duration
category
uploader
channel_display_name
owned_views

Weekly video ad revenue

This report aggregates weekly ad revenue for videos on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular week in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc. A weekly report begins on Monday and ends on Sunday.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_ad_revenue_raw_weekly_a1.

Daily ad revenue per video

This report summarizes daily ad revenue for videos on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular video on a particular day in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

Adjusted revenue may also have occurred in a previous month to the month associated with the report data. For example, a report posted in November 2016 may contain revenue adjustments from October 2016 or other earlier months.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_ad_revenue_raw_a1.

Aggregate ad revenue per asset

This report summarizes monthly, worldwide ad revenue for assets. Each row in the report includes monthly ad revenue totals for the asset. The report may contain multiple rows per asset if there are revenue adjustments for the asset related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_asset_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Daily ad revenue per asset

This report summarizes daily ad revenue for assets on a country-by-country basis. Each row in the report specifies the amount of revenue earned by a particular asset on a particular day in a particular country. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

Adjusted revenue may also have occurred in a previous month to the month associated with the report data. For example, a report posted in November 2016 may contain revenue adjustments from October 2016 or other earlier months.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_asset_ad_revenue_raw_a1.

Monthly claim ad revenue summary

This monthly report identifies videos that you have claimed and the assets that they match. Although the report name does contain the word "revenue," the reports do not currently contain revenue amounts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_claim_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Music labels
Music publishers

Weekly claim ad revenue summary

This weekly report identifies videos that you have claimed and the assets that they match. Although the report name does contain the word "revenue," the reports do not currently contain revenue amounts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_claim_ad_revenue_summary_weekly_a1.

Ads adjustments revenue

The ads adjustments revenue reports summarize ads revenue adjustments, including revenue from monetization in dispute and revenue from asset conflict resolution. These reports are only published when adjustments are made.

Monthly global ad adjustment revenue summary

This monthly report summarizes the worldwide ad adjustment revenue for all assets.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_global_ad_adjustment_revenue_summary_a1.
